Review Text: The Hospital das Clínicas FMUSP, by its nature, created to be a teaching center for USP medical students, suffers from its reputation for high scientific capacity with the high demand that has developed in the public health sector from the government. For new patients, appointments are made through the CROSS system, a public health regulation that you can find out about at your UBS.
